body: i had a couple rottweilers and i installed the in wall doggy door system to my back yard when my mom saw it and asked why on earth i would have installed a door large enough for a grown man to get through my simple response was if a burglar is dumb enough to not realize the size of the dog that requires this door i welcome them to try and come in not once was i ever robbed side note i trained them to sit about 5 feet behind me when i opened the door anytime a door to door person would come i would turn sideways and say if you can convince them to buy i will give my card not a single soul would make it past their intro pitch and a few of them even went running away from my door
